attributes.action: TELL THE PEOPLE how you plan to prevent Islamic fundamentalists infected with EBOLA from spreading the disease in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: With our porous borders we have no idea who is coming from where into these islands.  With our recently proven TOTALLY unfit for purpose EBOLA screening facility at Heathrow.  With our ONE and ONLY isolation unit already occupied. With our favourable treatment of foreigners under our human rights laws how can you stop EBOLA infected fundamentalist terrorists from wandering around the country passing it on to others on our streets.  The very first thing that should be done is to COMPLETELY REMOVE SELF SERVING POLITICIANS FROM ANY INVOLVEMENT IN THE IMMIGRATION/INCOMING VISITORS PROCEDURES?
